title: Couple With Heart Man Man Medium Light Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Two Men Holding Hands With Heart
description: Symbolizes a loving relationship between two men, with one having a medium-light skin tone and the other a light skin tone, signifying affection and togetherness.

This emoji is a clear and joyful expression of love and partnership between two men, beautifully rendered with the signature polish of Apple's emoji library.
